languages.text: {n}Будто в один миг остыв и утратив всю грандиозность своей фигуры, Соломон тихо произносит:{/n} "Как прикажете... {name}".
{n}All the intensity and presence seem to evaporate from Solomorne's frame as he quietly says,{/n} "As you command... {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Будто в один миг остыв и утратив всю грандиозность своей фигуры, Соломон тихо произносит:{/n} "Как прикажете... {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}All the intensity and presence seem to evaporate from Solomorne's figure as he says quietly,{/n} "As you command... {name}."
{n}All the intensity and presence seem to evaporate from Solomorne's figure as he says quietly,{/n} "As you command... {name}."
{n}All the intensity and presence seem to evaporate from Solomorne's frame as he quietly says,{/n} "As you command... {name}."

{n}All the intensity and presence seem to evaporate from Solomorne's frame as he quietly says,{/n} "As you command... {name}."

languages.text: {n}「仰せのままに…{name}」{/n}ソロモーンが静かに告げた時、彼の身体からは、威圧感も存在感もすべて消え去ったように見えた。
languages.original_text: {n}All the intensity and presence seem to evaporate from Solomorne's frame as he quietly says,{/n} "As you command... {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}「仰せのままに…{name}」{/n}ソロモーンが静かに告げた時、彼の身体からは、威圧感も存在感もすべて消え去ったように見えた。

languages.text: {n}Die gesamte Intensität und Präsenz scheint aus Solomorne zu schwinden, und er sagt leise:{/n} "Wie Ihr befehlt ... {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}All the intensity and presence seem to evaporate from Solomorne's frame as he quietly says,{/n} "As you command... {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die gesamte Intensität und Präsenz scheint aus Solomorne zu schwinden, und er sagt leise:{/n} "Wie Ihr befehlt ... {name}."

languages.text: {n}Toute la présence et l'intensité de Solomorne semblent le déserter et il vous répond d'une voix calme :{/n} « Comme il vous plaira... {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}All the intensity and presence seem to evaporate from Solomorne's frame as he quietly says,{/n} "As you command... {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Toute la présence et l'intensité de Solomorne semblent le déserter et il vous répond d'une voix calme :{/n} « Comme il vous plaira... {name}. »

languages.text: {n}Toda la intensidad y presencia de ánimo de Solomorne parecen evaporarse mientras responde en voz baja:{/n} «A la orden... {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}All the intensity and presence seem to evaporate from Solomorne's frame as he quietly says,{/n} "As you command... {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Toda la intensidad y presencia de ánimo de Solomorne parecen evaporarse mientras responde en voz baja:{/n} «A la orden... {name}».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙仿佛突然间失去了所有力量，甚至连他的存在本身都消失了。他以平静的声音开了口。{/n}“如你所愿……{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}All the intensity and presence seem to evaporate from Solomorne's frame as he quietly says,{/n} "As you command... {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙仿佛突然间失去了所有力量，甚至连他的存在本身都消失了。他以平静的声音开了口。{/n}“如你所愿……{name}。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne sessizce konuşurken tüm benliğini ve varlığını kaybediyor gibi görünüyor.{/n} "Emredersiniz... {name}"
languages.original_text: {n}All the intensity and presence seem to evaporate from Solomorne's frame as he quietly says,{/n} "As you command... {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne sessizce konuşurken tüm benliğini ve varlığını kaybediyor gibi görünüyor.{/n} "Emredersiniz... {name}"
